presentacion.title: I create web pages
presentacion.description: I'm a <1>Frontend Developer</1>. I'm studying Web Development and Mobile Applications.

Since then, I'm from there, I'm developing several projects both personal and studio projects, which allows me to advance in my professional career. career.
aboutMe.descriptionSecond: Right now I'm working as a freelancer, although I'm also interested in freelance work. I am also interested in working as a freelancer. My goal is to be able to live from this passion that is the creation of web pages, make my hobby my job, which I consider very important for one's mental health. important for one's mental health.

laGenerala.title: Generala
laGenerala.text: Web dice game that replicates the classic 'La Generala', with turn-based logic, scoring, and combination validation. Developed with React and Tailwind, featuring a decoupled architecture focused on business logic, allowing for easy scalability and maintenance.

araceliNails.title: Araceli Nails
araceliNails.text: Landing page developed with Angular and SCSS, focused on design and user experience. Includes animated sections, social media integration, and a mobile-first aesthetic. A showcase of how to combine modern frontend with attractive design.

administradorDiarios.title: Newspaper Manager
administradorDiarios.text: Web application for managing a newspaper sales business. Enables efficient handling of resources, sales, and returns. Developed with React, JavaScript, and CSS for the frontend, and Python with SQLite3 for the backend, providing a scalable and functional solution.
